==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|さん|ない|yomi=o}}

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[saɴnai]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|さんない|kyu=三內}}

# {{lb|ja|phonetics}} in [[w:Siddhaṃ script|Sanskrit]] phonology, a general term for the three [[w:Place of articulation|places of articulation]] that consonants are grouped into: [[w:Dorsal consonant|dorsal]] (/k, g, ŋ/), [[w:Coronal consonant|coronal]] (/t, d, n/), and [[w:Labial consonant|labial]] (/p, b, m/)

====Derived terms====
* {{l|ja|三内音}} (sannaion)
